title: runtime: random fatal errors on iOS
body:
/cc @ianlancetaylor 

According to the dashboard, the build started to fail with signal failures with a7cad52e04dd1890420452b38563997930edb2ca.

Before (mostly timeouts): http://build.golang.org/log/a04d0ed55471343ddd7dec8bb8ef9459cc02588e
After (signal failures): http://build.golang.org/log/32a73620035a8c1101d15bcbbdce2cdce640d70f
